DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct assess risk hepatitis B ( HepB ) diagnosis among diabetes mellitus ( DM ) non-DM patient 0-80 year age large population-based cohort United Kingdom ( UK ) use data CPRD database .
DOC.brief_title: This Study Aims Determine Incidence , Hepatitis B Diagnosis Among Diabetes Mellitus Patients 0-80 Years Age
DOC.detailed_description: The study retrospective , observational , descriptive , cohort study , DM non-DM patient 0-80 year age . As first step eligible baseline population CPRD define per data quality qualifier , include subject age 0-80 year , `` acceptable research '' register practice classify `` standard '' CPRD time period 2000- 2012 . The following cohort define baseline population : - DM cohort : Patients diagnose type 1 type 2 DM , confirm diagnosis medical code without DM related drug monitoring device prescription . - Non-DM cohort : Patients absence personal history DM diagnosis antidiabetic drug monitoring device prescription . From defined cohort , HepB case identify base clinical diagnosis code , Hospital Episodes Statistics ( HES ) positive diagnostic laboratory test result .

Subjects least 12 month observation time time inclusion study : Subjects register CPRD database least 12 month date inclusion study . Subjects register general practitioner practice classify 'up standard ' least 12 month date inclusion study . Particular Case New Born Children . To ensure inclusion subject less 1 year age , include regardless observation time CPRD .
